page.title: 17HOUSING.
page.content: Most of the housing in the area is large, detached. It is built of sandstone, the local building material, with rendering, stone flags, slates or tiles for roofing. The land itself belongs to the local farmers, landowners and householders. Most houses seemed to have quite a large area of land; used either as private gardens or market gardens. Many of the older properties have been beautifully renovated in an appropriate way. Throughout the area studied we found several hamlets, but no villages or towns.
